name: Super Velociraptor Party
description:
You’re hosting a party, but nobody came! Never mind, that means less washing up and you can still play all the cool party games!

Up arrow, down arrow and space bar are all the controls you’ll need!

My submission for Ludum Dare 41 - combine two incompatible genres. So, party game + single player!

I've been away from game jams for a couple of years, so this is just a little thing to dust off the cobwebs.
